Earnings Call Insights: Radiant Logistics (NYSE:RLGT) Q2 2025

Management View

  • CEO Bohn Crain emphasized the company's diverse service offerings, highlighting $12 million in adjusted EBITDA for the quarter, driven by strong project activity, including chartering 49 flights to transport 8 million IV fluid units
